Hi, i'm Simon.

I'm a freelance Web Developer.
I help people turn their ideas into eye-catching websites.

About Me

I've been in the tech industury for a little under 10 years. During my time in tech support, I found my niche was working on Websites. I began my journey to become a Web Developer which has now led me to being a Freelance Developer.
Having a background in tech has helped me fully understand how computer works, which in turn helps me with how to create websites. I have a keen eye for detail which I put in to each Website I create or develop.
Through using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, alongside other libraries, I build bespoke websites tailored to meet your needs. You can see a full ist of my skills below as well as my work.
